text: "Love Is the Law" is a 1997 debut single by British band The Seahorses and is the leading single from their only studio album Do It Yourself. It went to number 3 in the United Kingdom, number 1 in Scotland, number 38 in Sweden and number 11 in Ireland. ==Track listings== UK, Japanese, and Australian CD single # "Love Is the Law" – 3:42 # "Dreamer" – 3:31 # "Sale of the Century" – 3:50 UK 7-inch single :A. "Love Is the Law" – 3:42 :B. "Dreamer" – 3:31 ==References== Category:1997 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Hard rock songs
title: Love Is the Law (The Seahorses song)
